excerpt: The recast Construction Products Regulation (EU) 2024/3110 introduces a full Digital Product Passport framework in Chapter X. But when DPP obligations actually bite depends on harmonised standards and a delegated act that hasn't been adopted yet. Here's what the construction industry needs to know.
